title: Create a bar plot — generate_barplot
code: # example code barplot <- generate_barplot(dataset = mtcars, x = "gear", x_name = "Gear")  if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ barplot <- generate_barplot(dataset = mtcars, x = "gear", x_name = gear)  } # }
